body: Hey! Been a while since I've posted here (I've been on and off for a while, but not as active as I was, I've been busy with other things) but I'm back now, I'll be far more active in-game and on the forums. So, ask me (almost) anything?
body_tagged: Hey! Been a while since I've posted here (I've been on and off for a while, but not as active as I was, I've been busy with other things) but I'm back now, I'll be far more active in-game and on the forums. So, ask me (almost) anything?
title: Finally Back- Ask Me Anything?

replies.body: Wb :D. If Bob has 3 oranges, and Sam takes 2 away, what is the square root of McDonalds?

replies.body:
@Hobo 24.

@jozz It can be a bit stressful at times (for example, being the only staff member online for 1000 players) but it's mostly enjoyable. Feels good to make the servers a better place.
